dcterms:description: A dataset used for single-player Monte-Carlo tree search in the game SameGame, demonstrating the effectiveness of the proposed search algorithm.
dcterms:title: SameGame

dcterms:creator: M. P. Schadd
M. H. Winands
H. J. Van Den Herik

dcterms:description: A public set of positions for the SameGame, used to benchmark state-of-the-art search algorithms for single-player games.
dcterms:title: SameGame (public set of positions)
